------------------------------------------------------------------------

GIS data <br>

- [ ] &nbsp;STEER_HabMap

- [ ] &nbsp;STEER_boundary
- [ ] &nbsp;STEER_bathy

------------------------------------------------------------------------

This week you will create a map for publication in a DPNR pamphlet showing the locations of the proposed moorings (last week's exercise). You should already have all the layers needed for the map.

Your map will need to include the following features..

1.  Main map

2.  Map inset

3.  Graticules (Lat-Lon marks or grid lines). Use decimal degrees

4.  Scale bar

5.  North Arrow

6.  Title

7.  Legend

8.  Annotations

9.  Finally, export the map as a JPEG
